original_text: His prayer also, and how God was intreated of him, and all his sins, and his trespass, and the places wherein he built high places, and set up groves and graven images, before he was humbled: behold, they are written among the sayings of the seers.
korean_text: 또 그의 기도와 그의 기도를 들으신 것과 그의 모든 죄와 허물과 겸손하기 전에 산당을 세운 곳과 아세라 목상과 우상을 세운 곳들이 다 호새의 사기에 기록되니라

sentences.original_text: and how God was intreated of him
and the places wherein he built high places
and set up groves and graven images
sentences.korean_translation: 아세라 목상과 조각한 우상을 세운 것과

sentences.original_text: among the sayings of the seers
